quest.name: One Man's Trash
journal: Ealdwine, treasure hunter extraordinaire, appears somewhat out of sorts.

Through slurred speech, Ealdwine kindly offers to give you his last mysterious map, before remembering that he isn't at liberty to do so; instead, he bids you deliver it to his mother at Revenant's Toll. See the map safely to Brangwine, lest poor Ealdwine be on the receiving end of a bloody flogging.

Brangwine informs you that mysterious maps work like a charm on kitchen stains, and expresses her willingness to part with some from her stores. To be king of your kitchen, you must bring her the object of her morbid desires.
objectives: Deliver the map to Brangwine at Revenant's Toll.

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: Bah, nothin' worth a damn─jusht thish shtupid bloody rock...again. Ain't good for─hic!─half a pint o' pish... <sigh>

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: Byregot'sh buttock, if it ain't the ashpirin'─hic!─treasure hunterer from Bronshe Lake! What bringsh ye here, friend?

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: ...Hm? Ye need shomethin', 'venturer?

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: Wait, don't tell me... Ye was drawn to the─hic!─shweet shmell o' treasure, ain't that right?

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: Well then, treat yer noshtrilsh to thish! A myshterioush map what pointsh the way to─hic!─an ancient cache of untold worth!

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: Now, I know what yer thinkin': only a fool would reveal shuch─hic!─lucrarative informationsh to othersh─and I ain't no fool. But I like ye, 'venturer, and I wantsh ye to have this map─me very lasht one.

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: Problem ish, me ma collectsh 'em. Why? I don't remember, but if I don't give 'em to her, she'll─hic!─flog me bloody. Ye wouldn't want me to get flogged bloody, would ye? Of courshe not!

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: Yer a good sort, that'sh plain to shee. Ye wantsh to help Ealdwine, and ye can do jusht that by─hic!─runnin' the map over to Ma over at Revenant'sh Toll. Brangwine'sh her name.

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: Who knowsh? When she shees ye, might be as she'll take a likin' to ye and─hic!─let ye have the map. Don't quote me on that, though!

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: May the godsh─hic!─shpeed yer way, 'venturer! And while they're at it, they can shpeed mine, too─to lotsh of treasuresh and grog!

dialogue.name: EALDWINE
dialogue.text: Have ye taken the myshterioush map to me ma over at Revenant'sh Toll yet? Brangwine'sh her name. When she shees ye, might be as she'll take a likin' to ye and─hic!─let ye have the map. Don't quote me on that, though!

dialogue.name: BRANGWINE
dialogue.text: Why, hello there, young one. What can old Brangwine do for you, hmmm?

dialogue.name: BRANGWINE
dialogue.text: Oh my, a mysterious map! My drunken lout of a son has you running errands, I see. For that, I apologize. Rest assured he will be suitably disciplined for his indiscretion.

dialogue.name: BRANGWINE
dialogue.text: Why do I collect these maps, you ask? Well, it just so happens they remove kitchen stains like a charm. Something to do with the special ink they bear, I believe.

dialogue.name: BRANGWINE
dialogue.text: If you want your kitchen to be spotless like mine, I wouldn't be averse to parting with a map or three. My son keeps my stores constantly replenished, you see.

dialogue.name: BRANGWINE
dialogue.text: In exchange, I ask that you bring me...oh, let us say, articles found upon adventurers who misadventured. The gods know they have no further need of their worldly possessions, so you need not feel guilty.

dialogue.name: BRANGWINE
dialogue.text: Where are these articles like to be found? Why, where the deadliest creatures prowl, of course. Adventurers are drawn to them like moths to a flame, are they not?

dialogue.name: BRANGWINE
dialogue.text: By your questioning look, I take it you're wondering what interest I have in such salvaged items. You have secrets that you would sooner take to the grave, do you not? Let me keep mine, young one, and I will let you keep yours.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A repeatable quest is now available from Brangwine at Revenant's Toll.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Completing the quest will earn you a mysterious map.
